wordGroup: cyclone separator 旋风分离器（除尘器）

sentences.en: The race was called off as a cyclone struck.
sentences.cn: 由于旋风袭击，比赛被取消了。

sentences.en: The cyclone has resulted in many thousands of deaths.
sentences.cn: 气旋已经造成了成千上万的人死亡。

sentences.en: The normal cyclone season extends from December to April.
sentences.cn: 正常的飓风季节从12月持续到4月。
